biotools.summary:
an integrated platform for analysis and annotation of ribosome profiling data to decode mRNA translation at codon resolution.


Ribosome profiling (Ribo-seq) has revolutionized the translatomics field by mapping the position of ribosome-protected fragments (RPFs), which is typically ranging from 26bp to 34bp, over the entire transcriptome.

bioschemas.name: RiboToolkit
